job_description: Maintained continuous awareness of the advancements within the Web3 domain. Helped the community and development teams collaborate smoothly for feature requests and bug reports.
Attained proficiency in the latest trends in web development and Python technologies. Implemented dynamic and interactive elements to elevate user experience, leveraging Python-based frameworks.

Acquired advanced proficiency in supply chain optimization. In the capacity of a SaaS company collaborator, provided the business development team with forward-thinking ideas and data-driven solutions.

Contibuted as a Software Developer, worked on a team project using React and TypeScript. Collaborated to develop and improve software solutions, and gained hands-on experience in modern web development and teamwork.
Working on Web development with a focus on building responsive and scalable web applications including using JAM stack.
